mapper.sql: id as id , classifyName as classifyName , status as status , createDate as createDate , lastModDate as lastModDate
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO gk_video_classify ( classifyName, status, createDate, lastModDate ) VALUES ( #{classifyName}, #{status}, #{createDate}, #{lastModDate} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
mapper.update:
UPDATE gk_video_classify
classifyName = #{classifyName},
status = #{status},
createDate = #{createDate},
lastModDate = #{lastModDate},
WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE gk_video_classify
classifyName = #{map.classifyName},
status = #{map.status},
createDate = #{map.createDate},
lastModDate = #{map.lastModDate},
WHERE id = #{map.id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO gk_video_classify ( classifyName, status, createDate, lastModDate ) VALUES ( #{map.classifyName}, #{map.status}, #{map.createDate}, #{map.lastModDate} )
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM gk_video_classify
AND id like CONCAT('%', #{condition.id} , '%')
AND classifyName like CONCAT('%', #{condition.classifyName} , '%')
AND status like CONCAT('%', #{condition.status} , '%')
AND createDate like CONCAT('%', #{condition.createDate} , '%')
AND lastModDate like CONCAT('%', #{condition.lastModDate} , '%')
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ${sortBy}
